Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Houston in 1982...
Injured on 5/11/1983 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1985, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1985, off Roger Clemens (CHC)...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1986, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 6/12/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
